content.raw:
It took me longer to find that I'd care to admit, especially given this is what the "blame" button makes trivial \(which I only stumbled upon accidentally when I'd almost got there by randomly bisecting the commit history...\). But hey, now I know what the blame button does!

P.S. can't actually blame @cbillington because we never consistently switched usernames when committing in mercurial so it was probably me anyway :stuck_out_tongue:

It took me longer to find that I'd care to admit, especially given this is what the "blame" button makes trivial (which I only stumbled upon accidentally when I'd almost got there by randomly bisecting the commit history...). But hey, now I know what the blame button does!

P.S. can't actually blame @cbillington because we never consistently switched usernames when committing in mercurial so it was probably me anyway
